mapper.select: SELECT t.order_load_id, t.order_load_code, t.is_cold_print, t.is_pack_review, t.distribution_state, t.transport_type, d.car_code, t.driver, t.pack_reviewer, f.user_name pack_reviewer_name, t.delivery_staff, g.user_name delivery_staff_name, t.load_reviewer, h.user_name load_reviewer_name, t.create_at from order_load t LEFT JOIN order_load_details t2 ON t.ORDER_LOAD_ID = t2.ORDER_LOAD_ID LEFT JOIN bas_car d ON t.car_code = d.car_code LEFT JOIN sys_user f ON t.pack_reviewer = f.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user g ON t.delivery_staff = g.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user h ON t.load_reviewer = h.user_id WHERE t.distribution_state >= 2 AND t.transport_type = 1 AND t2.cold_drugs_qty > 0 AND t.is_cold_print = 0 /*AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM order_load_details TX, order_out TG WHERE TX.order_load_id = T.order_load_id AND TG.status < 160 AND t.wh_id = #{wh_id} )*/

SELECT t_lcp.barcode, t_hz.order_load_id, t_hz.order_load_code, t_dw.customer_code, t_dw.customer_name, t_sp.item_code, t_sp.item_name, t_sp.item_specification, t_sp.remark, t_sp.manufacturer, t_lcp.lot_id, t_lot.lot01, SUM(t_lcp.qty)qty, t_lcp.price, SUM(t_lcp.qty * t_lcp.price) amount, t_lcp.pack_no, t_lcp.cold_box_no, t_lcp.ice_chops_message, t_lcp.item_id, t_lcp.order_id FROM order_load_details t_mx INNER JOIN order_load_details_cold t_lcp ON t_mx.bill_id = t_lcp.order_id INNER JOIN order_load t_hz ON t_mx.order_load_id = t_hz.order_load_id INNER JOIN bas_item t_sp ON t_lcp.item_id = t_sp.item_id INNER JOIN bas_customer t_dw ON t_lcp.customer_id = t_dw.customer_id INNER JOIN bas_lot_att t_lot ON t_lcp.lot_id = t_lot.lot_id GROUP BY t_hz.order_load_code, t_hz.order_load_id, t_dw.customer_code, t_dw.customer_name, t_mx.order_load_id, t_lcp.pack_no, t_lcp.cold_box_no, t_lcp.ice_chops_message, t_sp.item_code, t_sp.item_name, t_sp.item_specification, t_sp.remark, t_sp.manufacturer, t_lcp.lot_id, t_lot.lot01, t_lcp.price, t_lcp.barcode, t_mx.load_sequence, t_lcp.item_id, t_lcp.order_id ORDER BY t_mx.load_sequence ASC, t_lcp.pack_no ASC
SELECT T.is_cold_print, T.is_pack_review, T.order_load_id, T.order_load_code FROM order_load T WHERE T.wh_id = #{wh_id} AND T.order_load_id = #{order_load_id}
SELECT BIANHAO 冷藏箱号 FROM JC_RQZLB WHERE RONGQ_TYPE = '5' AND RONGQ_STATE = '0' AND HOUSE_ID = #{HOUSE_ID} ${@com.yvan.Sql@phrase('AND', 'BIANHAO like')} ORDER BY BIANHAO ASC

SELECT JC_ZHIYDOC.ZHIY_NAME, JC_ZHIYDOC.ZHIY_ID FROM JC_ZHIYDOC, jc_ckzydz t WHERE SHEBDL_NAME = #{SHEBDL_NAME} AND JC_ZHIYDOC.Zhiy_Id = t.zhiy_id AND t.house_id = #{HOUSE_ID} AND BEACTIVE = 'Y' AND (PKG_TMS_PUB.F_GANGWEI_CHK(#{HOUSE_ID}, JC_ZHIYDOC.zhiy_id, '装车复核员') = 'Y' OR PKG_TMS_PUB.F_GANGWEI_CHK(#{HOUSE_ID}, JC_ZHIYDOC.zhiy_id, '配送员') = 'Y')
